name: Orb: Jam Version
description:
Music is not mine, Under attributtion:

Complex Mind, By Zilly Mike licensed under CC BY 3.0 
https://modarchive.org/index.php?request=view_by_moduleid&query=38451

A VERY short *card* game made for the MiniJam 119 Heaven Jam.

Tutorial, click and drag the orbs to use them.
You can drag the orbs on all sorts of things! You will HAVE to do this to win. Mess around.

There is only one battle, press R to retry.

Spoiler if you dont want to mess around:
Orbs over the end turn button will let you draw more cards next turn.
Attacks will reduce status effects or enemy intents.
Heals can increase status effects.
